name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Email Finder by Leadzen.ai | Get B2B Contacts

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Leadzen.ai - Get Verified and Accurate Leads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Leadzen.ai - Your ultimate sidekick to find company or prospect data on ANY website or LinkedIn profile.

Leadzen.ai gives you the easiest way to find B2B contact information across the globe🌎. Just one click and get B2B contact details such as emails and direct mobile numbers, and with the second click engage with them i.e., direct email, LinkedIn or WhatsApp.

Get empowered with the intelligence you need to start your prospecting journey and close deals faster than ever.

⚙️ How does Leadzen.ai’s Extension work?
 
* Leadzen.ai on LinkedIn: Scroll through the profiles of your top prospects and enrich dozens of contacts in one go using LinkedIn’s people search and Sales Navigator.
 
* Leadzen.ai Everywhere: Find key company and decision-maker data on any company website, anywhere on the web. 

🎁 It’s FREE to start 
Install Leadzen.ai on your browser and get access to contact and company data plus monthly 10 FREE email credits and 5 FREE phone number credits to prospect and unlock actionable info right away.

✨ 1 Phone credit = Unlock 1 Verified phone number
✨ 1 Email credit = Unlock 1 Verified email address.
 
🔄 One-click integrations
Build contact lists in seconds and export them directly in a CSV file.

🔒 Your data & privacy 
Leadzen.ai collects information about you that is similar to what you’d find on a business card. This data we collect comes from affiliates, third parties, publicly available sources, and our community. 

💵 Leadzen.ai Subscription Plans:

- Starting from only INR 2500 per month!
- We offer various monthly/annual plans, starting from 100 email and phone credits per month and suitable for your needs

🏃‍♂️Getting started

Starting to work with Leadzen.ai takes only a few steps: 

1️⃣ First of all, Install the Leadzen.ai extension from the Chrome Web Store (Here) 

2️⃣ Then, create an account, this takes only a few seconds. 

3️⃣ Finally, start building your prospect lists that matter to your business.
 
Sign up at right now and get 10 free credits to find the email of your prospect today!

⚠️Heads Up:

You can only export up-to 5 profiles at a time per page. To export more than this limit, you'll need to subscribe to Leadzen.ai platform. By upgrading, you'll gain the ability to export profiles without any limitations, enhancing your workflow and efficiency.  


✔ FAQ🤷

1. Can I use the Leadzen.ai email finder extension for free?
    Yes, the email extractor plugin is free, but you can use it only in the Google 
    Chrome browser for now.

2. What is Leadzen.ai?
    Leadzen.ai is a prospecting tool that utilizes artificial intelligence 
    technology to generate leads. It helps business professionals find 
    prospects and obtain their contact details for effective sales pitches.


3. How to find email addresses on LinkedIn?
    To find the email with the Leadzen.ai extension, open any LinkedIn profile 
    and tap on the «Unlock Work Email» button. 

4. How can I use email extractor software for business?
    You can use the Leadzen.ai extension to find emails of potential clients to 
    reach them without reputation risks to your email account.

5. Can I extract emails from websites by Leadzen.ai?
    Yes. Go to your desired website and click on the Leadzen.ai sidebar. You will 
    see the panel with the list of that company's employees. Unlock any profile 
    and get their email addresses and phone numbers.

6. How does Leadzen.ai work?
    The tool uses AI to provide verified and comprehensive data about potential 
    clients. This includes names, and contact information (like phone numbers 
    and email addresses), and allows users to contact leads directly through the 
    extension by linking their email accounts.


7. What features does Leadzen.ai offer?
    Leadzen.ai offers features such as adding company contact information to 
    your B2B database, finding new clients, creating sales pitches, and 
    providing real-time data about leads.


8. Who can benefit from using Leadzen.ai?
    It is ideal for salespeople, recruiters, headhunters, account managers, 
    marketers, business developers, and anyone with direct client contacts.

9. Is there an in-app purchase option available with Leadzen.ai?
    Yes, the extension offers in-app purchases.

10. What kind of data can I expect to receive about leads?
    Users can expect to receive detailed and verified data, including names, 
    phone numbers, email addresses, and other relevant contact information.
